title: VR-Based Immersive Learning Course on Local History and Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Regional History Understanding and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: A local history and culture education course for office/administrative professionals in non-traditional settings, implementing immersive learning via VR devices or smartphones/tablets in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can reconstruct the spatiotemporal context of local historical events with 80%+ accuracy through 360° VR experiences
Learners complete a project analyzing local cultural data collected in VR environments and visualizing it mathematically through graphs/charts
Learners can produce detailed reports proposing preservation strategies for local historical-cultural heritage using digital archives
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
